name: Parsleyed or Dilled Potatoes
keywords: dill, new potatoes, parsley, gluten-free, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup finely chopped parsley or 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh dill

recipeInstructions.text: For an attractive touch, use a paring knife to remove a thin band of skin around the middle of each potato. Leave the rest of the skin intact.
Wash the potatoes and put them in a saucepan with water to cover. Add salt. Bring to a boil and simmer for about 20 minutes.
Drain the potatoes and add the butter, pepper and parsley or dill. Toss well, and serve hot.
